column5: does any one know what the water level on lac seul is doing> I will be going up there next fri may 28 and want to know if it is up from last year. is there a web site that posts the water levels? thanks Gus

This link will take you to the Lac Seul site for past current and future forcasts.http://www.lwcb.ca/pdf/LacSeulGraph2004.05.21.pdf This link is the general link for water levels and forcasts provided by the Lake of the Woods Control Board

Gus do me a favor, when you get back from your trip write in and tell me what the levels were like and how they were hitting. I am going up in a few weeks around Ear Falls. The report that I got from our camp was that the water was better than last year at this time. Up 2 - 3 feet. Only half as much rock to look out for. Hope you do well but leave a little for the rest of us.

I just got back and the water levels are now normal to a little above normal. They had 15" of snow in Sioux lookout on the 10th. and some rain since

Water levels are up! They are very comparable to 2002 right now
